body.section:
PrerequisitesInstalling services requires that the HDP Installer 2.0, also known as HDPI, has already been installed.
The images for the individual services will be downloaded when the service installation is started. A separate download step is not necessary.
The installer retrieves service configuration information from the clouds.yaml file. If you did not create a clouds.yaml file earlier, you can create one now.

ol.li:
Download an RC file for the admin user and project.
Log in to Horizon using the admin account.
Download the OpenStack RC file.
Use scp to copy the RC file over to the Deployer.
SSH to the Deployer and source the RC file. You will need to provide the same admin password that you used to log in to Horizon.
source admin-openrc.sh
The installer retrieves service configuration information from the clouds.yaml file. If you did not create a clouds.yaml file earlier, you must create one now.
List the available ALS versions to install.openstack hdpi list --os-cloud mycloud | grep alsThe output should include:| als | wscatalog.2670 | 2.0.0 | available |

Use the ALS version number to view the details of the specific package. The output provides significant administration information such as download size, version, and so forth.openstack hdpi show wscatalog.2670 --os-cloud mycloud The output will appear similar to: +---------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | Field | Value | +---------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | actions | download | | description | als_2.0.0.517_qcow2.csu - Application Lifecycle Service for HP Helion Development Platform. | | download_size | 5157019481 | | email | | | id | wscatalog.2670 | | name | Application Lifecycle Service | | package_id | g11.2e8ab198-5b0f-4bda-9ec7-8ab9c13b53dd | | provider_name | Hewlett Packard Company | | service | als | | sku | B4CD85EA-742F-B8BA-DD39-3A81EEC89741 | | state | available | | type | PaaS Workloads | | version | 2.0.0 | | webpage | http://www.hp.com/helion/devplatform | +---------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

body.section: Install the ALS service.Run the following command: openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install --package wscatalog.2670 The output will appear similar to: Downloading Application Lifecycle Service which is available Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (available) Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (downloading) ……… Application Lifecycle Service is (downloaded) Staging Application Lifecycle Service in Glance/Swift Application Lifecycle Service is staged UI installed for application lifecycle service Create service endpoint for service application lifecycle service Completed installing application
